Trigger The skeleton is critically hit.

Effect The skeleton collapses into a pile of bones and the attack deals only normal damage. The skeleton can reform in a standing position as an action, but until it does, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Immobilized] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard].
